node.title: Explosions tear through Serbian munitions factory, killing two and injuring 16
node.description: The blasts reportedly shattered windows in nearby homes and could be heard in the centre of the Serbian capital 15 kilometres away.
node.content:
["A series of explosions has ripped through a\u00a0munitions factory on the outskirts of Belgrade, killing at least two workers and injuring at least 16.", "Police said the first explosion happened about 2pm at\u00a0Serbian turbojet and rocket engine maker EDePro,\u00a0which produces several sorts of munitions.", "The blasts\u00a0could be heard in the centre of the Serbian capital\u00a015\u00a0kilometres away.", "Police said rescuers were using drones to look for\u00a0more victims.", "Firefighters rescued five people from the rubble, they said.", "State media RTS said about\u00a040 people were inside the warehouse when the explosion happened.", "", "
The blast destroyed the factory, leaving a crater in the ground.(AP)
", "The injured workers were\u00a0transferred to hospitals in Belgrade with severe burns.", "More people are unaccounted\u00a0for.", "The warehouse, where 500 rockets and 30 kilograms of explosives were stored,\u00a0was completely destroyed, leaving a crater in the ground, footage from the scene showed.", "The fire had\u00a0been localised and residents in the area were safe, police said.", "", "
The Belgrade rocket factory suffered a similar incident in 2008.(AP: Edin Skoric)
", "Media have reported that the detonation shattered windows in\u00a0homes nearby.", "Dozens of firefighters were immediately dispatched to the scene, which is\u00a0south of Belgrade.", "Police and firefighters sealed off the area where thick billowing smoke was seen.", "Several vehicles at the plant's car park\u00a0were on fire.", "The factory was the scene of another explosion in 2008 when three workers were injured.", "ABC/wires"]
